channel.title: Compiling error
channel.description:
When I compile my client, it gives me this error: [code]client.java:10197: illegal start of expression myPlayer = this.playerArray[this.myPlayerIndex] = = new Player(); ^ 1 error [/code]
any ideas on how to fix?
BTW This is a PI client

item.title: Compiling error

item.description:

When I compile my client, it gives me this error:

client.java:10197: illegal start of expression myPlayer = this.playerArray[this.myPlayerIndex] = = new Player(); ^ 1 error
